name: Rat- Game Jam 2021
description:
Explore the sewers and maybe find Rat Bro? Something has taken him off the boat right in front of you. Adventure through the sewer, meet interesting characters and discover what secrets the sewers hold.  Solve puzzles and navigate through areas. 

This game was made with the idea that you ee through a rat's eyes. Rats are red-green colorblind so the game is played with a limited color palette. There is also pointillism applied to all of the textures

Made for Global Game Jam 2021 by:
Joey Gage
Colin Fullum
Titus Morrison
Lance Morrison
